forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 23. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Snow Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Wind chill values as low as -2. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday

forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 1pm, then a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 31. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 24 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. West wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

Nubs Nob.conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled with a track set yesterday. We plan to pack them today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: The natural snow from the past few days has been tilled into the base and the snow surface is excellent. There is another inch of light snow on top of the corduroy this morning. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
